shop.name: Dinoland Flying Shop
shop.desc: The Dinoland Flying Shop is always accessible. Just whistle (loudly - the shop can be a little hard of hearing) and the store will arrive, allowing you to purchase a variety of basic items. As you explore Dinoland, you'll come across other Shops in Dinoland with more interesting items.

shop.name: Forges Shop
shop.desc: The Forges are where items made from the fire of the Big All-Hot are sold. You can find lots of useful items for battle here.

shop.name: Fruity Shop
shop.desc: « If you leave some gold in the bucket hanging up in the old tree, a fruit will fall! »

shop.name: Shady Man
shop.desc: It's quite expensive. But it seems there is no other way to obtain it easily....

shop.name: Razad's Shop
shop.desc: Razad is an old nomad who has fled from the occidental steppes. These steppes became too dangerous for him to do business. Today, his shop is far more modest than before, but at least he is safe in the Rocky Outpost.

shop.name: Souk «lightning sales»
shop.desc: The souk is located near the Lodestone Pylons, which offer a beautiful view of the electric arcs. Unfortunatly, this shop is not out of the arcs' range, which can cause problems!

shop.name: Purveyor of Neerhel
shop.desc: The Purveyor's small shop is hidden in the depths of the Neerhel canyons, in a well protected creek. Very useful when you sense you are in danger.

shop.name: Barbarian trader
shop.desc: « The prices are non-negotiable! Do not touch the merchandise!. I SAID DO NOT TOUCH! If you touch anything, I will CRUSH you!»

shop.name: Secret Shop
shop.desc: « Team-W's secret shop. It contains all the items from the Magnetic Steppes in one place, and all at reasonable prices! »

shop.name: Magic Shop
shop.desc: Hidden away in a small Dinotown street, adventurers sometimes get lost and thus find the Magic Shop. Only extremely rare and powerful items are sold here. They can't be bought with common or garden gold coins. Furthermore, these items are enchanted: once equipped by a Dinoz, they can't be removed for several days!

shop.name: Cursed Shop
shop.desc: The Cursed Shop sells extemely rare items, only to be found here. There are people who say that whoever enters the shop will be cursed for life. Only those who are already cursed dare enter...

shop.name: Elite Boutique
shop.desc: Here you'll find many different objects used by the Vegetox special forces during their dangerous missions.

shop.name: Chen's Skillshack
shop.desc: Chen has given you access to some temporary skills, which are so powerful that they self-destruct after use. They are to be used sparingly.
